livegrep

Fast, regular expression code search service
git clone https://source.static.kevinlin.info/external/livegrep.git

Dockerfile (889B) (raw)

      1 FROM ubuntu:20.04
      2 
      3 RUN apt-get update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -y install \
      4         build-essential \
      5         libxml2-utils \
      6         wget \
      7         pkg-config \
      8         zip \
      9         unzip \
     10         zlib1g-dev \
     11         openjdk-8-jdk \
     12         git \
     13         openssh-client \
     14         python python3
     15 
     16 ADD https://dl.google.com/dl/cloudsdk/channels/rapid/downloads/google-cloud-sdk-268.0.0-linux-x86_64.tar.gz /tmp/gcloud.tar.gz
     17 RUN tar -C /usr/local/ -xzf /tmp/gcloud.tar.gz
     18 RUN /usr/local/google-cloud-sdk/install.sh
     19 
     20 ENV bazel_version 4.0.0
     21 RUN wget --quiet -O /tmp/bazel-${bazel_version}-installer-linux-x86_64.sh \
     22   "https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/download/${bazel_version}/bazel-${bazel_version}-installer-linux-x86_64.sh" && \
     23   chmod +x "/tmp/bazel-${bazel_version}-installer-linux-x86_64.sh"
     24 RUN /tmp/bazel-${bazel_version}-installer-linux-x86_64.sh
